name: Last Light (itch) (Divine Golem, Nullmike, alpyalti)
description:
This game is a 2D, Adventure where you play as  "Hector" who can not sleep with lights on. You should switch off all the lights before you can switch off your room's lights.

BUT BE CAREFUL!

Y O U 

          A R E 

                    N O T 

                             A L O N E

Gameplay:

The goal is to switch off every light in the other rooms. For the final stage, you have to go back to your room and switch off the light. You can move with "W A S D". For switching off the lights use  the "E"  button 

Programmer: Mike Stavr

Designer: Kadir Alp Yaltı

Audio & Narrative: Nail Türkoğlu
